column5: My place is close to The Kemah Boardwalk, 30 minutes from the Galveston beach, and 30-40 from the NRG stadium, 5-10 minutes from the Baybrook Mall and Top Golf, Dave and Busters, and Main Event., public transport. Youâ€™ll love my place because of all the activities to do around here and you do not have to travel far to have fun..
